changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.workspace_unit_authorization AS SELECT t.id, p.name AS product, u.name AS unit FROM ruleform.workspace_authorization t JOIN ruleform.product p ON t.product = p.id JOIN ruleform.unit u ON t.unit = u.id WHERE t.authorization_type = '2';
ALTER TABLE readable.workspace_unit_authorization OWNER TO core;
